sense.def:
A pilot
je človek, usposobljen za upravljanje letala.

To pilot an aircraft
pomeni upravljati letalo.

To pilot a new law or scheme
pomeni uvesti nov zakon ali program.

seg.quote: He was keen to see through the Bill which John Silkin was piloting.

sense.def:
Kadar je preskus projekta ali izdelka
pilot
, je majhen, da bi videli, ali bo uspešen.

seg.quote: This year we are trying a pilot scheme whereby the university leases one or two houses for students.
